functions.tag: {pages: ['{"text":"A broken door... it branches betwixt.\\n\\nCan we go beyond knowing beyond?\\n"}'], author: "???", title: "00010000", resolved: 1b}
{pages: ['{"text":"Treasure today,\\nA gift, a present,\\nFor all is lost in time."}'], author: "???", title: "00010001", resolved: 1b}
{pages: ['{"text":"Isn\'t this where we came in?\\n"}'], author: "???", title: "00010010", resolved: 1b}
{pages: ['{"text":"Absolute power corrupts absolutely.\\n"}'], author: "???", title: "00010011", resolved: 1b}
